title: At the Lake
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 16 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile BR70L
description: At the Lake provides students with a look at the things you can see and different kinds of activities you can do when you visit a lake. Detailed, colorful illustrations will engage students in the text, and repetition of the high-frequency word this supports early emergent readers. Students will also have the opportunity to classify information and to ask and answer questions to better understand the text.
reviewWords: boat, dock, fish, lake, rock, swimsuit
comprehension: Classify Information                : Classify information in a text
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word this
